glsa.title: gedit: Untrusted search path
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in gedit might allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: gedit is a text editor for the GNOME desktop.

description.p: James Vega reported that gedit uses the current working directory when searching for python modules, a vulnerability related to CVE-2008-5983.

impact.p: A local attacker could entice a user to open gedit from a specially crafted environment, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: Do not run gedit from untrusted working directories.
